justification: Acknowledges Team B’s floor preference and playoff schedule, but misapplies it by asking B to give up higher-tier, steadier assets (Flores, A. Torres) for lower-tier, committee pieces (B. Martinez Tier 5, A. Martin Tier 4). Limited separation of A’s needs vs. B’s incentives. Trade is feasible but value is lopsided and the rationale is generic and inaccurate (position mismatch, stability claims). B’s conservative, consensus-trusting profile makes acceptance unlikely.
